description: This file defines a React functional component 'LoginForm' that renders a login form UI, manages user input state, handles form submission by calling an authentication hook, and performs navigation upon successful login.

methods.name: LoginForm
methods.description: React functional component that renders a login form, manages form state, handles submission, and redirects on success.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function handling form submission, calling login API, and navigating based on response.
